title: 국제법 및 조약
intent: 국제법과 조약 체결 과정에서 사용되는 전문 언어를 마스터하고 법적 정확성을 구현한다.
lexset: treaty, protocol, jurisdiction, sovereignty, ratification, arbitration, bilateral, multilateral, covenant, statute

seeds.en: An international treaty has been concluded between the two nations.
The treaty ratification process is underway.
Disputes are resolved through arbitration procedures.
The principle of sovereignty must be respected.
A multilateral agreement has been concluded.
The International Court of Justice ruling is binding.
The international covenant has entered into force.
Legal grounds must be clearly presented.
